content.text:
# List of presidents of Finland by time in office__disambig_1

This is a list of presidents of Finland by their time in office. For a consecutive list, see list of presidents of Finland.
List
{| class = "wikitable sortable"
! President !! Length of term !! Took office !! Left office !! Note
|-
|  ||  || 1 March1956
| 27 January1982
| 4 terms serving,3rd longerThird term was longer than normal due to it was extended by four years by an exception law during the term,under normal conditions. and last shorter than normal• resigned due to poor health
|-
|  ||  || 27 January1982
| 1 March1994
| 2 terms serving,1st slightly over a month longer than normal
|-

| 1 March2012
| 2 terms serving
|-
|  ||  || 1 March2012
| 1 March2024
| 2 terms serving,1st one month shorter (but normal)According to the current Constitution of Finland, if the president is elected directly in the first round of the election,the term normally starts (and the previous one ends) on 1 February instead of 1 March.
|-
|  ||  || 11 March1946
| 1 March1956
| 2 terms serving,1st shorter than normalFirst term was shorter than normal due to while the martial law was in effect, a new term of office did not start,but it had been started by the predecessor Mannerheim.
|-

| 1 term serving,slightly under five months shorter than normalThe start of the President of Finland's first ever term was later than enacted due to the entry into forceof the Constitution of Finland, Constitution Act.

| 4 August1944
